results.name: a(n) = A002324(n) mod 2.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
J. S. Rutherford, Generating functions for the cage isomers of the C_{20n} icosahedral fullerenes, J. Mathematical Chem., 14 (1993), 385-390. See Eq. (3).
J. S. Rutherford, The enumeration and symmetry-significant properties of derivative lattices, Act. Cryst. A48 (1992), 500-508. [See Sect. (7), p. 505.]
formula: a(n) = Sum_{ m: m^2|n } A154272(n/m^2). - _Andrey Zabolotskiy_, May 07 2018
mathematica: Array[Boole@ OddQ@ If[# < 1, 0, DivisorSum[#, KroneckerSymbol[-3, #] &]] &, 105] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Nov 05 2017, after _Michael Somos_ at A002324 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Mar 12 2009
